turnstile-edit:
Message above the CAPTCHA for edit action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-edit}}
turnstile-addurl:
Message above the CAPTCHA for addurl (user added new external links to the page) action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-addurl}}
turnstile-badlogin:
Message above the CAPTCHA for badlogin action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-badlogin}}
turnstile-createaccount:
Message above the CAPTCHA for createaccount (user creates a new account) action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-createaccount}}
turnstile-createaccount-fail:
Error message, when the CAPTCHA isn't solved correctly.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-createaccount-fail}}
turnstile-create:
Message above the CAPTCHA for create (user creates a new page) action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-create}}
turnstile-help: Explanation of how to solve the CAPTCHA for API clients.
